org.openjdk.source.tree

接口 InstanceOfTree

  • 所有超级接口:
    ExpressionTree, Tree
    所有已知实现类:
    JCTree.JCInstanceOf

    public interface InstanceOfTree
extends ExpressionTree
    A tree node for an instanceof expression. For example: 
       expression instanceof type
    从以下版本开始:
    1.6
